channel.title: Our new tool, HelpSpot Vault for expiring text
channel.description:
Hey All!
Today we launched a little side project called [HelpSpot Vault](https://www.helpspot.com/vault). It's a simple tool for letting people send you confidential information without it living in your help desk or email forever. I talked a bit about how it works and the business case for it in a [short podcast](https://www.helpspot.com/ian/inside-helpspot-vault) as well.
I'm sure we'll also chat about it on Bootstrapped this week.
Feedback and questions welcome as always.
